name: 29 - Connection Game
description:
Free for a limited time.
29 is a new attractive game. Join 3 or more adjacent numbers to merge them to the next-number (1->2, 2->3, etc).
Begin the quest for number 29. Sound easy? Not quite. Finding the correct strategy to reach 29 and score points will be far from easy!
To reach your goal use the cutter to remove single numbers to make it easier forming a chain!
Could you get to 29? Play it now!
